thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com
thread.title: william hartland

author: william hartland
title: william hartland
text:
The ease of booking this car, on line, made it an easy decision to make.
I originally booked a smaller car as there were only 2 people in my party. When, however, our number doubled to 4 it was so easy to contact the company and arrange for a different car to be allocated to us for our week that it was all done within a matter of a couple of e-mails. Being picked up at the airport and driven to the pick-up centre on arrival and then being taken back there after depositing the car at the end of the week were such a great advantage. I would definitely use this firm again.
